verses.verse: And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2296>him<s%>, Gird up thy <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> this <S%H6378>vial<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead<s%>.

And when thou <S%H935>comest<s%> <S%H7200>thither<s%>, look out there <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%>, and go <S%H935>in<s%>, and make him arise <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H935>carry<s%> him to an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>chamber<s%>.

Then <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6378>vial<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it on his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. Then <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%>, and <S%H5127>flee<s%>, and tarry <S%H2442>not<s%>.
So the young <S%H5288>man<s%>, even the young <S%H5288>man<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead<s%>.

And when he <S%H935>came<s%>, <S%H8269>behold<s%>, the captains of the <S%H2428>host<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, I have an <S%H1697>errand<s%> to <S%H8269>thee<s%>, O captain. And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Unto which of us <S%H559>all<s%>? And he said, To <S%H8269>thee<s%>, O captain.

And he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%>; and he <S%H3332>poured<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> on his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee <S%H4428>king<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, even over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> thy <S%H113>master<s%>, that I may <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of all the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%>.

For the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>; and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H256>Ahab<s%> every <S%H8366>man<s%> - <S%H7023>child<s%>, and him that is shut <S%H6113>up<s%> and him that is <S%H5800>left<s%> at large in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>, and like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah<s%>.

And the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> in the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, and there shall be none to <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H6605>her<s%>. And he opened the <S%H1817>door<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%>.

Then <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of his <S%H113>lord<s%>: and one <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7965>him<s%>, Is all well? wherefore <S%H935>came<s%> this <S%H7696>mad<s%> fellow to <S%H559>thee<s%>? And he said unto <S%H3045>them<s%>, Ye know the <S%H376>man<s%> and what his talk <S%H7879>was<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, It is <S%H8267>false<s%>; <S%H5046>tell<s%> us <S%H559>now<s%>. And he said, Thus and thus <S%H559>spake<s%> he to <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Then they <S%H4116>hasted<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> it under him on the <S%H1634>top<s%> of the <S%H4609>stairs<s%>, and <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> is <S%H4427>king<s%>.

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H3141>Joram<s%>. (Now <S%H3141>Joram<s%> was <S%H8104>keeping<s%> <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead<s%>, he and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>;

but <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3088>Joram<s%> was <S%H7725>returned<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> of the <S%H4347>wounds<s%> which the <S%H761>Syrians<s%> had <S%H5221>given<s%> <S%H3898>him<s%>, when he fought with <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>.) And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, If this <S%H3426>be<s%> your <S%H5315>mind<s%>, then let <S%H408>none<s%> <S%H6412>escape<s%> and go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> it in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> rode in a <S%H7392>chariot<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>; for <S%H3141>Joram<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H274>there<s%>. And Ahaziah <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3141>Joram<s%>.

Now the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> on the <S%H4026>tower<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, and he <S%H7200>spied<s%> the <S%H8229>company<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> as he <S%H935>came<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H8229>company<s%>. And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H7395>horseman<s%>, and <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, and let him say, Is it <S%H7965>peace<s%>?

So there <S%H3212>went<s%> one on <S%H7392>horseback<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Is it <S%H7965>peace<s%>? And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What hast thou to do with <S%H7965>peace<s%>? <S%H5437>turn<s%> thee <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H6822>me<s%>. And the watchman <S%H5046>told<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7725>them<s%>, but he cometh not back.

Then he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> on <S%H7392>horseback<s%>, who <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H559>them<s%>, and said, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Is it <S%H7965>peace<s%>? And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, What hast thou to do with <S%H7965>peace<s%>? <S%H5437>turn<s%> thee behind <S%H310>me<s%>.

And the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, He <S%H935>came<s%> even unto <S%H7725>them<s%>, and cometh not back: and the <S%H4491>driving<s%> is like the <S%H4491>driving<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%>; for he <S%H5090>driveth<s%> <S%H7697>furiously<s%>.

And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Make <S%H631>ready<s%>. And they made <S%H631>ready<s%> his <S%H7393>chariot<s%>. And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, <S%H376>each<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot<s%>, and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> him in the <S%H2513>portion<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3088>pass<s%>, when Joram <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%>, that he <S%H559>said<s%>, Is it <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H3058>Jehu<s%>? And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, What <S%H7965>peace<s%>, so long <S%H5704>as<s%> the <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> and her <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%> are so <S%H7227>many<s%>?
And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%>, There is <S%H4820>treachery<s%>, O <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%>.

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> drew his <S%H7198>bow<s%> with his <S%H4390>full<s%> <S%H3027>strength<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3088>Joram<s%> between his <S%H2220>arms<s%>; and the <S%H2678>arrow<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> at his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and he sunk <S%H3766>down<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> Jehu to <S%H920>Bidkar<s%> his <S%H7991>captain<s%>, Take <S%H5375>up<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him in the <S%H2513>portion<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%>; for <S%H2142>remember<s%> how <S%H7392>that<s%>, when I and thou rode <S%H6776>together<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5375>laid<s%> this burden upon <S%H4853>him<s%>:

Surely I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H570>yesterday<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%>, and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and I will <S%H7999>requite<s%> thee in this <S%H2513>plat<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. Now therefore <S%H5375>take<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into the <S%H2513>plat<s%> of <S%H1697>ground<s%>, according to the word of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

But when <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5127>this<s%>, he fled by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> - <S%H1004>house<s%>. And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7291>followed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, <S%H5221>Smite<s%> him also in the <S%H4818>chariot<s%>: and they smote him at the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H1483>Gur<s%>, which is by <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%>. And he <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%>, and died <S%H4191>there<s%>.

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7392>carried<s%> him in a chariot to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his <S%H6900>sepulchre<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.
And in the <S%H6240>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3141>Joram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> began <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And when <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H7760>it<s%>; and she painted her <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H3190>attired<s%> her <S%H7218>head<s%>, and looked <S%H8259>out<s%> at the <S%H2474>window<s%>.
And as <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> entered <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, she <S%H559>said<s%>, Is it <S%H7965>peace<s%>, thou <S%H2174>Zimri<s%>, thy <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H2026>murderer<s%>?

And he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H2474>window<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Who is on my <S%H8259>side<s%>? who? And there looked out to him <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Throw her <S%H8058>down<s%>. So they threw her <S%H8058>down<s%>; and some of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> was <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and on the <S%H5483>horses<s%>: and he trod her under <S%H7429>foot<s%>.

And when he was come <S%H935>in<s%>, he did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6485>See<s%> now to this <S%H779>cursed<s%> <S%H6912>woman<s%>, and bury <S%H4428>her<s%>; for she is a king's <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.

And they <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H4672>her<s%>; but they found no more of her <S%H518>than<s%> the <S%H1538>skull<s%>, and the <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of her <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

Wherefore they came <S%H7725>back<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>. And he said, This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, In the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> shall the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%>;

and the <S%H5038>body<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> shall be as <S%H1828>dung<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, so that they shall not <S%H559>say<s%>, This is <S%H348>Jezebel<s%>.
